website_summaries.verdict: Loaded with vitamins, minerals, and omega fatty acids, and sourced from farm-raised Australian emus, this natural therapy emu oil is great for moisturizing, improving the appearance of aging skin, and reducing inflammation.
pros: High in omega 3, 6 and 9 fatty acids
cons: Although this is an expensive formula, it is made from premium ingredient sources

customer_reviews.title: Not plain emu oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd bottle I will be returning. The label says it’s pure emu oil, no added herbal ingredients. However, the last three bottles I have ordered all have some type of herbal scent/ingredients...maybe eucalyptus? This is a serious quality control issue, especially for people with allergies to these oils!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product
customer_reviews.text: I love emu oil. It was recommended to use this oil before & after surgeries. This allows for cleaner cuts & the cuts heal faster. And more importantly, it helps to lessen the scarring. Since then, I have used this daily to keep my whole body reveling in softer skin. I also have very dry feet & hands. Since using this product, I have had great improvement in the softness of my hands & feet. And my cuticles which gave always been sandpaper, are so much nicer!!! Use this product & you'll be delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritace

customer_reviews.title: Neuropathy
customer_reviews.text: My mom has neuropathy in her feet that causes a lot of burning pain. I first got her the emu cream and then we decided to try this oil. Although she liked the cream, she likes the oil better. She feels it is stronger on her pain and will last longer. We are so grateful for this oil because it has definately taking off the edge of her pain. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Begetti

customer_reviews.title: Pump Inoperable, Better Emu Oil products available for less
customer_reviews.text: The pump arrived broken - it intermittently dribbles, but mostly dispenses nothing. The ingredients are not listed on the box and it has an odd fragrance I can’t place - perhaps an essential oil. Texture is a bit lumpy and not like other Emu Oil I have used in the past. Leven Rose makes a better and less expensive Emu Oil I will be reordering on Amazon instead.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieCharles

customer_reviews.title: Great for moisturizing and growing eyelashes too!
customer_reviews.text: Great for skin and hair. I originally used it skin only and then I tried it on my lashes- wow! I had eyelash extensions and found out I was allergic to the glue, which caused my lashes to thin out. I thought I would never get them to grow again but this oil mixed with black castor oil is the truth! I think they're longer now than they have ever been in my life. It's worth the money- give it try.
customer_reviews.author: MiraMae

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My son has had really bad eczema since birth and I did so much research on what to buy and your product was highly recommended! I’m so happy I spent the money on your amazing product it truly works! You have stay consistent with using it on your dry spots! My sons skin became healthier and softer and clear from breakouts! Thank you so much buy this product you won’t regret it! Worth every $$ !!! Thank you so much lol
customer_reviews.author: solovely

customer_reviews.title: This Emu Oil for psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: This Emu Oil is a high quality product. I have tried a small farm product that worked great but the cost was too high for me. I have psoriasis everywhere. This helps with keeping my skin moisturized and is effective on the constant itch. Use this layered over other oils or alone. I don't notice any bad odor. I use essential oils anyhow so I would recommend the same to anyone else. I can't say enough good things!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing oil!
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I received was grainy. I know that natural products can be like this sometimes, but I had never received a bottle that wasn’t a smooth liquid. I contacted the company and they were more than happy to send me a new bottle at no charge. They also sent me some samples of the lavender body wash to try. I use emu oil for EVERYTHING! Sun burn, dry skin, facial serum,etc. I love this product and am extremely happy with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My skin was breaking out and really dry and this has helped a lot. I use it only at night before I go to bed. My hands and face have felt pretty great. I still get some breakouts but it doesn't seem to be as bad. I like the smell and it feel luxurious going on. Didn't create any miracles though.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: For moisturizing during vulvar cancer treatment
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil as a moisturizer during cancer radiation therapy for the vulvar area. It has worked tremendously well to soothe the tender, radiated pelvic area skin, and was recommended to me by other vulvar cancer patients. My Dr gave me permission to use it; one should always consult with their Dr before using any remedies during cancer treatment. This Emu Oil also helped with itching, peeling, and soreness. The 6.8 oz size has lasted for more than 2 months. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M. Field

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review and since my first review, I have repurchased this product a few times. It has done a great job of reducing the scarring my husband has on his legs from eczema. I will definitely continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Product works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product after my radiation therapy to help to decrease the damage during my treatments. This product works great and my radiation oncologist is both surprised and pleased with how well my skin is holding up after 5 weeks. I am so glad I found this product and will continue to use it as a face moisturizer too as it also helps with fine lines (added bonus).
customer_reviews.author: LynnK

customer_reviews.title: Soothing with a very mild odor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Emu oil on a recommendation of someone for soothing an irritated area after surgery. The oil is smoothing and has a mild odor. However it is very thin so you need to be careful when dispensing as it tends to slide off your hand. A little expensive but it did do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: The Best Grade of Emu I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: Best Emu Oil Ever! Oh my goodness! I am so please and will be buying this oil again very soon. This is eczema season (smile, but not really). I hate the winter months. My skin goes totally crazy... Nothing else works but high grade emu oil. It stops the itching and provides moisture throughout the day. Really, I can sleep without this oil. Here's the other great news... its also anti-inflammatory so whenever my knees start to act up, just a little drop goes a long way. Totally the best brand I've used thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: This oil has helped him a great deal. It did not clear up the bruising
customer_reviews.text: As a cancer patient, my father has blisters on his feet and they are extremely tender and bruised. This oil has helped him a great deal. It did not clear up the bruising, but he can really tell the difference if he does not apply the oil in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have only been using it for maybe a week or so and have already seen great results. I know everything takes time to work but this by far has been an amazing product. My skin looks smooth and hydrated without an oily appearance. I am also letting my daughter use this as well and she loves it. You know how skeptical 13 year old's are about what their mom's suggest. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rather Messy
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a fine product but it doesn't absorb on my skin therefore, making it a hot mess! I love Emu oil but have used it in creams prior to this. For me it's simply not a good product. What part of oil didn't I understand!
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: It is oily on my skin but good
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be very good for your skin. I use it at night so it stays on my skin a long time. It is oily though. It still is on my face in the morning. I like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Dreams in art

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: The smell. Doesn’t smell like pure emu oil. Smell like an additive was used. I’ve been using pure emu oil for years. This doesn’t smell or feel like pure emu oil. I have sensitive skin and I’m experiencing an allergic reaction after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: athanasia widman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I’m about 2 weeks in and using every ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’m about 2 weeks in and using every night. The emu oil absorbs very quickly and is working wonders as a moisturizer. I’ve not tried any other brands for comparison but I really love this one. Using only a small amount needed I can see this will last a long time. Will update after used for a longer amount of time!
customer_reviews.author: PO52

customer_reviews.title: Flies landing on me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the menthol smell. after that smell diminishes, it's a strange odor. the flies kept landing on me the first time I used the oil. I have not used it enough yet to see if it actually improves my skin. I can say it's not on the first day or second day that I've seen an instant change like I had heard it would produce. I will keep using the oil to see if it makes a difference. After a week I will update my review
customer_reviews.author: Dawn D.

customer_reviews.title: It is the best single product I have ever used on my face
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Ultra Pure Australian Emu Oil on my face for a couple of months. It is the best single product I have ever used on my face. I was having issues with a chemical type burn on my face & neck and it was the only thing that would keep my skin from drying, cracking and peeling in those areas. The burned areas are now healed and I have continued using it twice a day. It is keeping my skin smooth and supple without being greasy. I am now a loyal customer of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say its magic in a bottle but i notice it helps maintain his outbreaks from getting too bad!
customer_reviews.text: got it for my sons eczema and im about to order another bottle! I wouldn't say its magic in a bottle but i notice it helps maintain his outbreaks from getting too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Shaundra smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper is NOT better
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST emu oil, I want to kick myself for trying another brand.....spend the extra couple dollars IT IS WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Home Mommy

customer_reviews.title: The oil works great. Very moisturizing & absorbs quickly but has a ...
customer_reviews.text: The oil works great. Very moisturizing & absorbs quickly but has a slightly unpleasant smell. I really like the one with pink sugar but out was unavailable this time & I was told may not be available in the future. A friend had some pink sugar (a French perfume) and added it to my bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cmacy

customer_reviews.title: Strong bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Seems to moisturize well, but has a very strong, sort of antiseptic smell. It’s supposed to be 100% pure emu oil, so I’m thinking maybe it’s gone bad?
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the quality, the only reason I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality, the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I thought it was a bit overpriced compared to getting it locally for the same amount of oil.
customer_reviews.author: shirley jean moore

customer_reviews.title: Item as expected
customer_reviews.text: Formula was a bit grainy, but otherwise worked as expected. My family has been using emu oil for 15+ years for many different things. We've used it for burns (to prevent scarring), bug bites, dry skin, etc. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this product! I have only been using it for a few days but I love the texture of the oil! Not greasy And moisturizing. We will see how it is after a few weeks but reading all of the reviews on it I am expecting great things!
customer_reviews.author: Tinkeroo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a friend who has ichthyosis in the family which is a skin disease that causes the skin to shed 3 times faster than normal. It has worked very well for the person and I will continue to buy this as they run out.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very moisturizing (a little goes a long way) and not grainy like some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Best face moisturizer out there!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing emu oil from this company. I can’t say enough good things about it! I have been using it as my face moisturizer for about a year now, and I can honestly say this is the first winter I have maintained my soft non dry skin! My make u goes on so much nicer when I use this compared to when I don’t. I also feel like it has made my eyelashes longer and fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very emollient. Skin feels great.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff soaks right into your skin and is not greasy at all. Very light scent that diminishes over time. I like to use it at night after exfoliation and a mask. It is a bit too dewy to wear during the day, but when winter comes and the air gets really dry out, I might start wearing it during the daytime as well. Great product. Showed up in less than two days.
customer_reviews.author: Timmothy Sears

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to heal about anything I've used it on and it moisturizes really well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Callicotte

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for extremely dry, chapped skin on my hands. It is working very well!!! I had some issues with the pump/dispenser not working well and was sent a whole new bottle. I very much appreciate this great customer service and will continue to order from this company! Thank you, Karen
customer_reviews.author: Karen Chronister

customer_reviews.title: Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandma and she loves it. She said she likes it more than the current emu oil she uses, and the price was even better. Thank you seller! And as always, thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: CAtoAKgal

customer_reviews.title: Half my bottle is empty
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt this is a quality product, but my bottle arrived half empty!! For the price I paid, I’m very disappointed that they are saying it’s over six ounces. Definitely jilting people on the amount they get. I’m thinking of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice emu oil, penetrates quickly and leaves your skin soft and smooth. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Emu oil recommended for minor skin irritation.
customer_reviews.text: Have just started using this oil as recommended by a cosmologist. Too early yet to notice results, however it absorbs rapidly and makes my skin feel very supple and smooth. 4 stars this time because I prefer unscented products. I fully anticipate ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good emu oil
customer_reviews.text: Good oil . I did use the sample given by you but not organic one . It is fine for my nail n face . This time I order yr organic one .
customer_reviews.author: A.M

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product but inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading the reviews and used it to treat my skin after radiation treatment. It was very effective and I recommend it to several people however the quality of the second bottle I ordered was not the same. The product was "gritty" even after I let it stand in hot water. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jakobus DuPlessis

customer_reviews.title: This is GREEEEEATTTTT!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a carrier oil for EVERYTHING. I have pustular psoriasis on my palms and the soles of my feet, and when I mixed this Emu Oil with the balm that I use, I noticed immediate results. I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product. I also use it in my home made deep hair conditioning creme. I love this product so much I order 2 of them everytime!
customer_reviews.author: AW2020

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this moisturizer for over a year and really like the results. Although it is a little pricey, a little goes a long way. It is quickly absorbed into the skin and gives it a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Siran

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice oil, trying something new, comparing it to other types of oils. So far very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine tends to not pump as easily. Not sure why but it does not impact ...
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using the product so it is too soon to give a complete review. I bought two bottles...one for me and one for my daughter. Her bottle works more efficiently. Mine tends to not pump as easily. Not sure why but it does not impact the product quality just ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Deplorable
customer_reviews.text: This item came opened and used. It’s smelled rancid.i need this item for a special gift most disappointing item I’ve ever purchased. I highly recommend stay away from this product
customer_reviews.author: michelle smith

customer_reviews.title: Emu Oil Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for dry skin and burns. I would highly recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really works, and gets rid of wrinkles if used on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Db

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Emu oil is a game changer and this one is superb.
customer_reviews.author: SDart

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great emu oil, I love using it as a moisturizer and my daughter uses it on her piercings. I will be buying it again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on the skin. No breakouts. Moisture lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Emu is the best! love it.doesn't smell as bad as others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the oil absorbs into my skin and the way it leaves my skin looking ang feeling.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, mixes well with other oils and helps my eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and use it every day
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and use it every day. My skin tends to be dry and this soaks in, not leaving skin greasy, and last throughout the whole day. Couldn't be happier. Glad I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Provax

customer_reviews.title: The truth regarding moisturizing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Like the moisturizing effect but dislike the smell. To me it smells like engine oil.
customer_reviews.author: BEATRICE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the oil. It is thick, has no smell and really hydrated my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Bought it to help decrease scars on my daughters face. Used it for 10 days now and scaring is not as red. Wonderful customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Callie Luond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Emu oil is good for almost everything, burns, cuts, toe fungus, thin skin.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time order. My wife loves this. She mixes this with essential oil. Wonderful for both face and body.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and excellent product. Reviewers said it makes dark spots lighten and, although not having taken it for very long - I believe that I am seeing that to be a fact. I would like re-visit this issue when I have used it for a longer time. This emu oil makes the skin very soft, but does not leave the skin greasy. For me, it has been much more effective than far more expensive products.
customer_reviews.author: LLBrit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Never greasy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Never greasy, always helps with arthritis stiffness. We recommend this product to everyone. One thing to users: remember to shake bottle before use.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Post surgical redness and scarring.
customer_reviews.text: Used the product on sternal and lower limb incision sites to decrease the redness post open heart surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Baumgarten

customer_reviews.title: pleased with the results thus far
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, pleased with the results thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amida U Koroma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The Emu Oil is perfect for facial moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many things!
customer_reviews.text: This is my THIRD purchase of this brand--both the first bottle lasted almost a year! I love this stuff for everything, but particularly to take off eye makeup and for moisturizing my hands and feet. My eyelashes are actually longer from its use; and living in the desert climate, it has been so helpful in fending off dry skin. While I may use other products first, this one goes on last and makes what is under it much more effective. I recently shared a sample with a friend who had a scrape/sunburn and it healed almost overnight. This product is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne/STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Tried it and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user of emu oil. I really like this product. I'm a 65 year old female and I use it on my feet. The calloused areas are completely gone. I use it on achy joints and have found relief. I use it on my arms and legs and the "creapy" skin is smoother and softer. I rated this product as 4 stars only because nothing is perfect. However, this product is very close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but a very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: absorbs well, helps dry skin. could use a little longer spout, sometimes ends up down the side of the bottle, but a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Judith E.

customer_reviews.title: Some help with pain of neuropathy.
customer_reviews.text: Y-Not Natural Emu Oil appears to helps with the pain of Neuropathy. I put some of the oil on my feet before bedtime and the pain seems less during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn H Anderson

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product and I like the delivery bottle
customer_reviews.text: wonderful product and I like the delivery bottle, easy to use. Company replied to my questions quickly, very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the pump
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the pump. It’s a larger bottle than most, which is great for myself. The product exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: How did you make the pump to work? There is no any instructions or arrows, I tried to unscrew it in different directions, I couldn't make it to pump. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be sure that I used this for a full week prior to rating it. I used this according to the directions. Unfortunately, I can't tell any difference. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The Most Important Part of My Skincare Routine
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing! I use it mixed with a potent serum to pull the serum ingredients deeper into my skin. Recently had 6 weeks of pnemonia/bronchitis and two rounds of antibiotics so my aesthetician was expecting to lecture me on dehydration at my appointment. Instead she could not believe how hydrated and glowing and plump and beautiful my skin was. Not bad at 70! I also use emu oil to pull healing essential oils or my cbd balm deeper into the body. I can stop my knee pain every time using the emu oil.
customer_reviews.author: Elgin Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I could but I don't want to have to be without it ever again. I have extremely dry and paper thin skin. I've tried various lotions and creams boasting 'the best ever'. I ordered this from a friend's raving that had used it after her radiation treatments. I have never regretted this purchase x2.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact it’s Halal
customer_reviews.text: I love this emu oil, this is my third bottle, I had two pink sugar versions. I use it on my hair, face and body, this product is absolutely amazing. My girlfriend took my emu oil after she found out my secret My first time using emu oil, on the third day of using, it removed two small black heads I’ve had for years, not to mention how smooth and vibrant my face has become. It works like magic for my thick curly hair. Any bumps I get from shaving after applying emu oil in 12 hours you barely see any and in 24 hours no more bumps.
customer_reviews.author: ScenTyle

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to all
customer_reviews.text: After undergoing 21 rounds of radiation to my left breast and underarm area, I ended up with a major burn under my arm with oozing. Within 2 days the pain and burning was gone as well as the oozing. I have also used this on my hands where the psoriasis has flared up again and it had helped ease the itching while healing the splitting areas. Would recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Y-NOT Emu Oil is PRIMO!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great emu oil product and I've used emu oil for years. It's relatively light and a little does go a long way. The only thing I didn't really care for is the slight odor of what smells like eucalyptus. However, it doesn't bother me enough to keep me from using it!!! I love emu oil and I'm going to enjoy using Y-Not Emu Oil. It's PRIMO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! This oil was recommended for post op care ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This oil was recommended for post op care after a partial vulvectomy for Vulvar Cancer. This product needs to be offfered to every woman after having this surgery! I have been using this oil almost 2 weeks now and it has made such a difference in post op care. The skin is softer and healing much better now due to this oil. Thank you for selling this! Now if only I could find the soap for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from the intense itch and skin scaling of psoriasis. My daughter gave me some to use and this oil has stopped the itch and softened the patches of dry scaly skin. I immediately ordered myself a bottle! This is an amazing product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKerz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! I had been buying a sugar scrub with emu oil and I loved it but was very expensive so decided to just try the oil alone. Great moisturizer, arrived quickly. Its been too soon to see if it has any real effects but as for moisturizing it is great. Doesn't really have a scent. Large bottle and you only need a little so should last a long time. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona L. Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected.
customer_reviews.text: Too thin to stay in place. May be good if in bed or applied to bandageable area. Not sure if over prosessed. Been using emu for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large Pure Australian Emu Oil
customer_reviews.text: This Emu Oil has a stale smell; therefore, I'm using it on my feet only. Initially, It feels greasy on the skin; but it soaks in later. It works great on the top of my feet, but does nothing for dry heels and bottom of feet (need petroleum jelly for that). This product is grease, not a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Carandos

customer_reviews.title: Worked the best on my skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product. It helped so much with my severe skin problem especially on my face. This is the only moisturizer I now use. It has no odor and absorbs well into the skin and not greasy. I've used other brands and I found Y-Not Natural the best, I just wished it didn't cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne R.

customer_reviews.title: My radiologist recommended this to help my skin as I went thru ...
customer_reviews.text: My radiologist recommended this to help my skin as I went thru radiation. Wonderful product. I use it for a super moisturizer now that I am healed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Templin

customer_reviews.title: Great natural moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this 3 times, I really like it. I use it at night - definitely gives an oil slick but then fully absorbs by morning. I feel better using a natural product and my skin looks healthy.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 different companies so far and this is the BEST! I like that it is in the pump ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered emu oil from 3 different companies so far and this is the BEST! I like that it is in the pump container which keeps the quality and prevents contamination. It has more of the oil and less of the white thick substance telling me it is truly ultra refined. I've been an insulin dependent diabetic for 58 yrs and use emu oil for skin health, burns, bruises and particularly an my feet. It helps with circulation and skin integrity. Thank you for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's great for dry skin and arthritis pain. I particularly like this Emu Oil because it's not gritty like some of the other brands I've tried. I'm definitely a believer in the benefits of Emu Oil and plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Janie57

customer_reviews.title: The best Emu oil I’ve ever found
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil it was very healing & is my favorite brand of this kind of oil. My skin looks SO much better due to my use of this product!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that has helped my severe dry skin from diabetes. It has also helped my husbands eczema. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing oil. I purchased this product after I began ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing oil. I purchased this product after I began using Retinol products to help with the irritation and faking skin. Yes it did an outstanding job with my irritated faking skin but it also healed my skin fast while keeping it smooth and moisturized. I love this product and I am about to order their eye serum. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: verdonda mayes-cooper

customer_reviews.title: Heavy on the pores and doesn’t do anything for pain
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for several days and while it did make my skin soft it wasn’t that much better than argan oil. My face felt smothered and my pores felt clogged. I tried it for my back, neck, and shoulder pain with no noted relief.
customer_reviews.author: amazonabby

customer_reviews.text: The stuff feels great on the skin has no odor and is expensive but a little goes a long way

customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this brand very long, but it seems great & my cats love to lap a couple of drops before bedtime! It makes their fur soft & shiny.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell you how good the customer service is. It's as good as the product, which is totally 5 stars!

customer_reviews.title: This oil has so many uses, and the amount ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil has so many uses, and the amount you get is quite generous. I have used it on itchy skin spots with this cold long winter, as well as mixing it with my regular lotions to keep my skin pliable and moist.

customer_reviews.title: Positive results!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Y-Not Emu Oil on my surgical incisions. I have used other scar treatments on previous surgeries and this oil has been the best at reducing the redness.

product_meta.title: Y-Not Natural - Organic Pharmaceutical 100% Pure Emu Oil 200ml | Free Range Aboriginal Omega 3, 6 & 9 Oil for Hypoallergenic Skin Care, Hair and Healing | All Natural Source of Vitamin K2
feature_bullets: ✅YOUR BEST SKIN STARTS NOW. Australian emu oil mirrors your skin's natural lipids, so it can penetrate deeper than any other oil, soothing and regenerating even the deepest layers of your precious skin. Ultra-purified in a hospital grade facility, our users report break-throughs for soothing skin, hair, or scalp; on burns, scars, eczema, fine lines, tattoos, or piercings; and with problem and itchy skin!

☀️A SPA-LIKE EXPERIENCE FOR YOUR SKIN. Our incredible oil is steam distilled with REAL EUCALYPTUS OIL using a patented method that removes the odor normally associated with even the freshest oils. From start to finish, our process is built on purity, perfection, and your personal satisfaction. Because our oils are never boiled, dehydrated, or concentrated like the leading brands, our luxury oil's texture is always smooth, rich, and soothing. So go ahead, pamper yourself. You deserve it!

✅ENJOY THE HIGHEST QUALITY AUSTRALIAN EMU OIL ON THE PLANET. Rest easy knowing that our luxury oil is free range, sustainably produced, and bottled in a hospital grade facility. It is also clinically tested and genetically pure. It is no accident that our 100% pure Australian emu oil is sold in twenty four countries across six continents. You simply won’t find a more trusted or environmentally conscious producer of highly purified Australian emu oil. Your choice for luxury oil at bulk pricing!

☀️START GETTING RESULTS. Trust the best Australian emu oil on earth to nourish tired skin, feed brittle hair, and promote growth and regeneration for skin, hair, nails, and lashes. It is also effective on dry feet, hands, and even your pets will love it! We stand behind the world's finest Australian emu oil with a FULL PRODUCT LIFETIME GUARANTEE. If you're not completely satisfied, simply return this product for a full refund.

✅JOIN THE Y-NOT NATURAL SKIN CARE REVOLUTION! For absolute BEST RESULTS, use with Y-Not Natural Natural Eye Cream with Pure Emu, and Y-Not Natural Pure Emu Caps. Don't forget to look for our full line of Y-Not Natural, Jillaroo, and Genome Skin Care and Hair Care products!
